meanings.definition: A medical doctor who specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of heart diseases.
meanings.sent1: The cardiologists at the hospital work tirelessly to help patients with heart problems.
meanings.sent2: Many people trust cardiologists to take care of their heart health.
meanings.sent3: The cardiologists joked that they have a lot of heart-to-heart conversations with their patients.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of heartbreak, cardiologists are the healers of broken hearts.
meanings.sent5: The image of cardiologists diligently studying heart scans is etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: The group of medical professionals who focus on the study and care of the heart and its functions.
meanings.sent1: Cardiologists collaborate with other healthcare providers to ensure comprehensive heart care.
meanings.sent2: The team of cardiologists discussed the latest advancements in heart treatment.
meanings.sent3: During the conference, the cardiologists shared fascinating stories about heart surgeries.
meanings.sent4: The dedication of cardiologists to heart health is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The room buzzed with excitement as cardiologists presented their research findings.
